The Light of Days: The Untold Story of Women Resistance Fighters in Hitler's Ghettos bụ akwụkwọ na-abụghị akụkọ ifo nke 2021 nke onye edemede mba Canada Judy Batalion.

Kirkus Reviews kpọrọ akwụkwọ ahụ "akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụmụ nwanyị ndị Juu lụrụ ndị mwakpo Germany na Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ" na "ihe mgbakwunye a nabatara na akwụkwọ nke Shoah na nke mmegide ndị Nazi". Diane Cole nke Wall Street Journal dere na akwụkwọ ahụ "adịghị emebi ịkọwa omume obi ọjọọ nke obi ike na mmekpa ahụ nke ndị Nazi hụrụ ma tachie obi," na-akpọ akwụkwọ a "akụkọ a nyochara nke ọma na nke na'adọrọ mmasị".

Klein nke Boston Globe dere na akwụkwọ ahụ "na-eme ka ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ banye n'ime psyche nke ụmụ nwanyị ndị a" nakwa na nyocha Batalion dị oke egwu, na nraranye ya na akụkọ ya doro anya ma na-akpali akpali
nke odide, mkpochapụ ala, na ngwakọta nke usoro oge na usoro isiokwu - nwere ike igbochi ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ na-agbasi mbọ ike

" Mgbe ọ na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ The ew York Times, Sonia Purnell kwuru na akwụkwọ ahụ "nwere oke iwe na nganga," mana na "ọchịchọ Batalion ịtụ ụtụ nye ọtụtụ dị ka o kwere mee bụ ihe kwere nghọta, mana akụkọ dị mfe nke nwere isiokwu ole na ole nwere ike ịdị ike karịa
